proposal: Diving into the world of staking with PoolsEcosystemDocs? 🌊 Their omnichain liquid staking protocol, paired with Curve for boosted yields, is quite the catch. With only 2 holders in the ETH network, it's like finding a rare pearl in the vast ocean. Imagine enhancing this treasure with our B2B tools; from creating your own DEX to launching a lottery where the community, not just the team, benefits. Let's make those yields and rewards even more rewarding. 🔄🎰
